original_text: And it was found written, that Mordecai had told of Bigthana and Teresh, two of the king's chamberlains, the keepers of the door, who sought to lay hand on the king Ahasuerus.
korean_text: 그 속에 기록하기를 문을 지키던 왕의 두 내시 빅다나와 데레스가 아하수에로 왕을 암살하려는 음모를 모르드개가 고발하였다 하였는지라

sentences.original_text: that Mordecai had told of Bigthana and Teresh
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개가 빅다나와 데레스에 대해 알렸다는 것

sentences.original_text: who sought to lay hand on the king Ahasuerus
